text: The Samsung Galaxy J3 (2018) (also known as Galaxy J3 Star, Galaxy J3 Aura, Galaxy J3 V (2018) and Galaxy Amp Prime 3) is an Android smartphone manufactured by Samsung Electronics and was released on June 8, 2018. == Specifications == === Hardware === The Galaxy J3 (2018) is powered by an Exynos 7570 SoC including a quad-core 1.4 GHz ARM Cortex-A53 CPU, an ARM Mali-T720MP2 GPU with 2 GB RAM and 16 GB of internal storage which can be upgraded up to 400 GB via microSD card. It has a 5.0-inch Super AMOLED display with a HD ready resolution. The 8 MP rear camera features f/1.9 aperture, autofocus, LED flash, HDR and Full HD video. The front camera has 5 MP with f/2.2 aperture. === Software === The Galaxy J3 (2018) is shipped with Android 8.0 "Oreo" and Samsung's Experience user interface. Verizon branded J3 (2018) and J3 V (2018) can be upgraded to 9.0 "Pie" and One UI. == See also == * Samsung Galaxy * Samsung Galaxy J series * Samsung Galaxy J2 Core * Samsung Galaxy J4 Core * Samsung Galaxy J6 * Samsung Galaxy J series * Samsung Galaxy J4+ * Samsung Galaxy J6+ * Samsung Galaxy J8 == References == == External links == * Category:Samsung mobile phones Category:Samsung Galaxy Category:Smartphones Category:Android (operating system) devices Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2018
title: Samsung Galaxy J3 (2018)
